name: The Great Pumpkin
description:
Initially submitted for the Mini Jam 89.

The spirit of the Great Pumpkin is making their rounds to deliver goodies to children this Halloween night.

What is the Great Pumpkin?
The Great Pumpkin is an unseen character in the comic strip Peanuts by Charles M. Schulz. According to Linus van Pelt, the Great Pumpkin is a supernatural figure who rises from the pumpkin patch on Halloween evening, and flies around bringing toys to sincere and believing children. Linus continues to have faith in the Great Pumpkin, despite his friends' mockery and disbelief.
Great Pumpkin - Wikipedia

Controls:
Up/Down arrows: navigate menu
Space/Enter: confirm menu, drop candy
R key: restart game
Esc key: quit game

Additional Attributions:
Keeping scope creep at bay: My Darling Partner
Music: hosch (https://hosch.itch.io)
